Aaron Rono

Up next...Story of my life

My name is Aaron (double a and rhymes with Aron) Rono. I’m a software engineer who loves to communicate through beauty of code. I’d love to describe and express myself through work and spread the magic of to many. I’m an android engineer with 4+ years of constantly evolving with it. A lot has changed since the early days of android but the party never stops. I believe in the power of constant learning. When am not optimizing performance on the app side, I’m probably building a cute API. I started with Php in the early days and now I’m using Node js (MERN/MEAN/MEVN – V for Vue). When I’m not engineering I’m probably far away from my machine or probably asleep or listening to country music. I enjoy learning from other people while sharing what’s in my mind(literally and not through Facebook). What I believe to be true: Customers matter a lot so never ignore a feedback. If you’d like to communicate about anything or you’ve been looking looking for someone as described above to work with, shoot me an email (shown on top) or through twitter. Find me at twitter with @Aroniez handle.
